name: Cloud Jump (Thannox)
description:
Cloud Jump

Plot: You are a fallen meteor that has crashed down to Earth. In order to be reunited with your friend back home you travel across the clouds while avoiding evil thunder clouds that shoot lightning in order to stop you. While you travel up the clouds a constant rain pour will stop you in your tracks if it touches you. Can you reach Cloud 9 and find your friend?

This game still has some flaws and glitches. 

Difficulty may vary.
